ruby-term-ansicolor: A ruby library that colors strings using ANSI escape sequences
ruby-test-unit: An xUnit family unit testing framework for Ruby
ruby-test-unit-rr: test-unit-rr is a RR adapter for test-unit
ruby-test_declarative: Simply adds a declarative test method syntax to test/unit
ruby-text: A collection of text algorithms: Levenshtein, Soundex, Metaphone, Double Metaphone, Porter Stemming
ruby-thin: 軽くて高速な Ruby ウェブサーバー
ruby-thor: 強力なコマンドラインインターフェイスを作成するためのツールキット
ruby-tilt: Generic interface to multiple Ruby template engines
ruby-timers: Schedule procs to run after a certain time, or at periodic intervals, using any API that accepts a timeout
ruby-tins: All the stuff that is not good/big enough for a real library
ruby-titlecase: Ruby version of John Gruber's TitleCase.pl
ruby-toml: Parser construction library with great error reporting in Ruby
ruby-treetop: A Ruby-based text parsing and interpretation DSL
ruby-trollop: Commandline option parser for Ruby that just gets out of your way
ruby-tzinfo: Daylight savings aware transformations between times in different time zones
ruby-unf: Wrapper library to bring Unicode Normalization Form support to Ruby/JRuby.
ruby-unicorn-engine: QEMU ベースの軽量・マルチプラットフォーム・マルチアーキテクチャ CPU エミュレータフレームワーク
ruby-vimrunner: Spawn a Vim instance and control it programatically
ruby-webmock: Allows stubbing HTTP requests and setting expectations on HTTP requests.
ruby-webrick: An HTTP server toolkit that can be configured as an HTTPS server
ruby-x25519: An efficient public key cryptography library for Ruby providing key exchange/agreement via the X25519 (a.k.a. Curve25519) Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman function as described in RFC 7748
ruby-yard: YARD is a Ruby Documentation tool. The Y stands for "Yay!"
ruby-zeitwerk: Efficient and thread-safe code loader for Ruby
ruby2.7: An object-oriented language for quick and easy programming, version 2.7
runc: OCI 準拠コンテナを管理する CLI ツール
rust-bindgen: Automatically generates Rust FFI bindings to C (and some C++) libraries
rustup: Rust ツールチェインインストーラ
rx_tools: Implementation of librtlsdr rtl_* tools using SoapySDR as the driver backend
rz-cutter: Qt and C++ GUI for rizin reverse engineering framework
rz-ghidra: Deep ghidra decompiler integration for rizin and rz-cutter
